description: 学习以s, x, ch, sh结尾的名词复数变化：加-es

basic_rules: 以s结尾加-es：bus → buses, class → classes
以x结尾加-es：box → boxes, fox → foxes
以ch结尾加-es：watch → watches, match → matches
以sh结尾加-es：dish → dishes, brush → brushes
memory_tips: 记住：s, x, ch, sh结尾的名词加-es
这些音比较特殊，需要加-es来发音更清楚
可以记成：'四兄弟'（s, x, ch, sh）都要加-es
common_errors: I have two box. (错误) → I have two boxes. (正确)
The bus are coming. (错误) → The buses are coming. (正确)

sentences: I have one box. → I have two boxes.
The bus is coming. → The buses are coming.
This is a watch. → These are watches.
I see a dish. → I see many dishes.

templates.question: 将下列单词按复数变化分类：box, bus, watch, dish, book, pen
templates.answer: 加-es：box, bus, watch, dish；加-s：book, pen
templates.explanation: s, x, ch, sh结尾加-es，其他一般加-s

learning_objectives: 掌握以s, x, ch, sh结尾的名词复数变化规则
能够正确识别需要加-es的名词

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用-es结尾规则，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握-es结尾规则，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解-es结尾规则，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对-es结尾规则不熟悉，需要重新学习
